LanguageData.Apparel_CowboyHat.label: cowboy hat
LanguageData.Apparel_CowboyHat.description: Stylish yet rugged, this hat keeps the sun and rain off - and it gives anyone who wears it a bit of extra charm. It is the most important part of traditional western attire.
LanguageData.Apparel_Tuque.label: tuque
LanguageData.Apparel_Tuque.description: A soft, thick cap. Great for keeping warm in winter.
LanguageData.Apparel_MilitaryHelmet.label: military helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_MilitaryHelmet.description: Old-looking and heavy, but effective. Protects against low-velocity projectiles, shrapnel, falling debris, and cuts to the head.
LanguageData.Apparel_KevlarHelmet.label: kevlar helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PsychicFoilHelmet.label: psychic foil helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PsychicFoilHelmet.description: A thin helmet containing finely-tuned sheets of psychically-absorptive foil. Reduces the impact of psychic events.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet.label: power armor helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet.description: A part of power armor set, mostly used by heavy infantry.
